headline: Boston Scientific Reshapes Portfolio With Nalu And Penumbra Neuro Deals
summary: Boston Scientific (NYSE:BSX) has completed the acquisition of Nalu Medical, expanding its presence in chronic pain treatment. The company has announced a pending US$14.5b deal for Penumbra, which would significantly increase its scale in neurovascular devices. These transactions represent a major reshaping of BSX’s portfolio in neuromodulation and neurovascular care. Boston Scientific is a large medical device company with products across cardiology, peripheral interventions, urology and...
